About the Package An action pack for doing the operation on YAML File.
=Setup= * This Action pack uses Windows/Unix Agent. * The Agent should be able to access YAML File.
=Common Inputs= YAML File Path: Provide the full path to the YAML file. E.g. D:\Yaml\Input.yml YAML Content: Provide YAML content or a variable that contains YAML content.
Following actions are supported.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.ACTION.REMOVE_YAML_CONTENT * Action Description: This action is used to remove YAML content from the given YAML element path. YAML element path can consist either data, array or object.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_YAML.PUB.ACTION.CONVERT_YAML_TO_FROM_JSON * Action Description: This action will convert YAML to JSON and vice versa. e.g. Sample YAML: --- firstName: Cena lastName: Smith isAlive: true age: 27 address: streetAddress: 21 2nd Street city: New Jersey state: NY postalCode: 10021-31005 phoneNumbers: - type: home number: '' INVALID: '123456' - type: office number: 646 555-4567 - type: mobile number: 123 456-7890 children: - Others Key Blank - Others Key Blank spouse:
Note * To read YAML data we are using JSON expression.
path to YAML Element = $.firstName YAML_DATA = Cena
For Object If Path exists:Yes [path to YAML Element] = $.address.state YAML_DATA::=NY
For Array If Path exists:Yes [path to YAML Element] = $.phoneNumbers[2] UC4RB_JSN_DATA::={type=mobile, number=123 456-7890}
